item.title: Uttar Pradesh background
item.description: Task Produce chart and maps data on Uttar Pradesh that could serve as slot in chunks for other reports on the state. Data Expected to be sourced from Wikipedia and Wikicommons and comprise open source user produced data that is freely shareable. Other information R packages used include magick1, rsvg2, rvest3, and, kableExtra4. 1. Seal Original file size: 478x478 pixels and 38KB
